name: Daily Trading Report
overview:
Daily Trading Report provides individual investors with insights into the investing styles and processes of banking groups and hedge funds.

Daily Trading Report specialises in the investing style known as Global Macro. This involves forming an investment thesis, based upon understanding and leveraging trends of global capital flows. Also known as “Top Down” investing, Daily Trading Report typically invests in markets rather than individual companies.

Utilises its proprietary technology, Daily Trading Report has developed its “Underneath the Radar” service. This analyses over 30,000 market data points daily, identifying and confirming trends of global capital flows, and more importantly, when these are changing.

Brad McFadden, Chief Investment Officer, publishes daily market editorials, and a number of sample investment portfolios for differing risk profiles. Subscribers discuss, challenge, and learn from one another through our Squawkbox, which is our private messaging service.
